name: Muscle Battery (ludum dare 39)
description:
Running out of power, make muscular mens  hustling to generate energy to fullfill the battery on which they walk.

This battery will allow us to do stuff..

But take care, too much hustle will exhaust them!

Place items that muscular mens love to lead them.

Keys 1,2,3 : Select item.
Click on ground to put an item and attract any muscular man loving it
